tool_description: Effortlessly encode or decode URLs with our straightforward API. Whether you need to secure sensitive information or decode complex URLs for readability, our service is designed to handle it all. With a simple API call, you can encode URLs for safe transmission or decode them for easy comprehension. Simplify your URL manipulation tasks and ensure seamless data exchange with our efficient URL Encoder/Decoder API.
name: URL Encoder/Decoder
title: URL Encoder/Decoder

api_list.name: Decode
api_list.description: Decode the encoded URL using "GET" request.

api_list.name: Encode
